name: Bob The Excavator
description:
Bob got stuck in a part of the mine. He needs to escape by blowing up the crates in front of the exit! 

How to play:
Press E to pick up dynamite. Press Space to drop it and let it explode.  All explosions hit every single tile around them, and can blow up all boxes. Try to make a chain reaction with the TNT crates.

Press R to restart the puzzle.

This game was intended for the Indie Tales game Jam, but I missed the deadline.
